extensionShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the extension's name.

extensionDescription.message: Cuscenza di a privacy, Adblock sicuru per YouTube™. Blocca l'annunzii in YouTube.com.

timesaveInfo.message: Adblock per Youtube™ salvatu circa. $savedTime$ di a vostra vita.
timesaveInfo.description: Tells the user how many time he saved already.

displayVideoBranding.message: Mostra l'infurmazioni di l'estensione sottu u video

displayActionCountAsBadgeText.message: Mostra e richieste bluccate contanu in badge
